messages.subject: My son is looking for World of Warcraft junkies...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! My son and I have been playing World of Warcraft, an online D&D-style role-playing game, since Christmas. We split the cost of the game and are splitting
messages.messageBody:
Hi!

My son and I have been playing World of Warcraft, an online D&D-style
role-playing game, since Christmas. We split the cost of the game and
are splitting the cost of the monthly online charges.

Although I enjoy the game and play sporadically, Nick is *really* into
it. None of his IRL friends are into it and he finds the online forums
too impersonal. He'd like to talk or email with someone, or several
someones :o), who also are into this game. I'm not into it enough for
him :o) Are any of your kids playing this? And would like to talk with
Nick about it?

Thanks!
Diana Tashjian
